abstract: Smartphone technology and social media play pivotal role for migrants fleeing Middle East for Europe; middle-class migrants from places like Syria find smartphones indispensable, allowing them to locate themselves on maps, communicate in real time about successful routes and keep in touch with loved ones; social media has also cut into trafficking business, as many place more confidence in technology than smugglers.
lead_paragraph: For the tens of thousands of migrants flooding into Europe, smartphone maps, global positioning apps, social media and WhatsApp have become essential tools.

headline.main: A 21st-Century Migrant’s Essentials: Food, Shelter, Smartphone
headline.print_headline: A 21st-Century Migrant’s Essentials: Food, Shelter, Smartphone
